text: Eric Walter Elst (30 November 1936 - 2 January 2022) was an astronomer from Belgium. Elst has found nearly 3,500 asteroids, including many notable asteroids. An asteroid, 3936 Elst, was named after him. He was born in Mortsel, Belgium. Elst died in 2 January 2022, aged 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Asteroid discoverers Category:Belgian astronomers Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Eric Walter Elst
